com.facebook.buck.android

Class SplitZipStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.android.SplitZipStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Step

    public class SplitZipStep
extends java.lang.Object
implements Step
    Split zipping tool designed to divide input code blobs into a set of output jar files such that none will exceed the DexOpt LinearAlloc limit or the dx method limit when passed through dx --dex.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SplitZipStep(ProjectFilesystem filesystem, java.util.Set<java.nio.file.Path> inputPathsToSplit, java.nio.file.Path secondaryJarMetaPath, java.nio.file.Path primaryJarPath, java.nio.file.Path secondaryJarDir, java.lang.String secondaryJarPattern, Optional<java.nio.file.Path> proguardFullConfigFile, Optional<java.nio.file.Path> proguardMappingFile, com.facebook.buck.android.DexSplitMode dexSplitMode, Optional<java.nio.file.Path> primaryDexScenarioFile, Optional<java.nio.file.Path> primaryDexClassesFile, Optional<java.nio.file.Path> secondaryDexHeadClassesFile, Optional<java.nio.file.Path> secondaryDexTailClassesFile, java.nio.file.Path pathToReportDir)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SplitZipStep

        public SplitZipStep(ProjectFilesystem filesystem,
            java.util.Set<java.nio.file.Path> inputPathsToSplit,
            java.nio.file.Path secondaryJarMetaPath,
            java.nio.file.Path primaryJarPath,
            java.nio.file.Path secondaryJarDir,
            java.lang.String secondaryJarPattern,
            Optional<java.nio.file.Path> proguardFullConfigFile,
            Optional<java.nio.file.Path> proguardMappingFile,
            com.facebook.buck.android.DexSplitMode dexSplitMode,
            Optional<java.nio.file.Path> primaryDexScenarioFile,
            Optional<java.nio.file.Path> primaryDexClassesFile,
            Optional<java.nio.file.Path> secondaryDexHeadClassesFile,
            Optional<java.nio.file.Path> secondaryDexTailClassesFile,
            java.nio.file.Path pathToReportDir)
        Parameters:
        inputPathsToSplit - Input paths that would otherwise have been passed to a single dx --dex invocation.
        secondaryJarMetaPath - Output location for the metadata text file describing each secondary jar artifact.
        primaryJarPath - Output path for the primary jar file.
        secondaryJarDir - Output location for secondary jar files. Note that this directory may be empty if no secondary jar files are needed.
        secondaryJarPattern - Filename pattern for secondary jar files. Pattern contains one %d argument representing the enumerated secondary zip count (starting at 1).
        proguardFullConfigFile - Path to the full generated ProGuard configuration, generated by the -printconfiguration flag. This is part of the *output* of ProGuard.
        proguardMappingFile - Path to the mapping file generated by ProGuard's obfuscation.
